biotools.summary: Takes a nucleotide sequence as input and estimates off-target effects caused by dsRNA (double-stranded RNA) employed in RNAi studies. It can be used either to verify previously designed dsRNA sequences, or to design off-target minimized dsRNAs.

bioschemas.name: dsCheck
bioschemas.summary: Takes a nucleotide sequence as input and estimates off-target effects caused by dsRNA (double-stranded RNA) employed in RNAi studies. It can be used either to verify previously designed dsRNA sequences, or to design off-target minimized dsRNAs.
